task_definition_name: Mobile-wallet: Pressing logout should open an alert dialog box asking for confirmation
description:
## Objective 
Pressing logout should open an alert dialog box asking for confirmation of user to logout

## Description
Currently pressing the logout button directly logOut the user, It should open an alert dialog box asking
for user confirmation to logout

More details can be found on the following issue page  on GitHub:
https://github.com/openMF/mobile-wallet/issues/564

## How to get help
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our
 [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists)
 or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
